callee: SELECT b.brand_id, b.brand_name, b.brand_description, b.logo_url, b.website_url, b.created_at, b.updated_at, COALESCE(SUM(sp.quantity), 0) AS total_quantity FROM brand b LEFT JOIN product p ON b.brand_id = p.brand_id LEFT JOIN product_variation pv ON p.product_id = pv.product_id LEFT JOIN stock_product sp ON pv.variation_id = sp.variation_id GROUP BY b.brand_id, b.brand_name, b.brand_description, b.logo_url, b.website_url, b.created_at, b.updated_at
